All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Answer
Represents the answer fragment in the game.
Answer
Represents an answer in the game.
BrowsingActivity
Represents the browsing activity in the game.
BrowsingAnswer
Represents the browsing answer fragment in the game.
BrowsingConstants
Constants for browsing logic.
BrowsingController
Controller for browsing logic.
BrowsingQuestion
Represents the browsing question fragment in the game.
BrowsingStart
Represents the browsing start fragment in the game.
BrowsingStates
Represents the browsing states in the application.
BrowsingStates.BrowsingState
Enumeration of possible browsing states.
BrowsingViewModel
ViewModel for browsing logic.
Evaluation
Represents an evaluation of a game round.
Evaluation.PlayerScore
Represents a player's score in the game.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FriendGamePage
Represents the friend game page of the application.
GameActivity
Represents the game activity in the game.

Constants for game logic.

Controller for game logic.
GameStart
Represents the game start fragment in the game.
GameStates
Represents the game states in the game.
GameStates.GameState
Enumeration of possible game states.
GameViewModel
ViewModel for game logic.
MyAnswer
Represents a player's answer in the game.
Player
Represents a player in the game.
Preferences
This class is used to manage the preferences of the application.
Question
Represents the question fragment in the game.
Question
This class represents a question with its text and sub-questions.
Question.SubQuestion
This class represents a sub-question with its key, values, and correct index.
QuestionDetail
Represents the question detail fragment in the game.
QuestionParser
A utility class for parsing question files in JSON format.
Round
Represents a round in the game.
RoundPlayer
Represents the round player fragment in the game.
RoundStart
Represents the round start fragment in the game.
Score
Represents the score fragment in the game.
Start
Represents the start of a game round.
StartingActivity
Represents the starting activity in the game.
StartingStates
Represents the starting states of the game.
StartingStates.StartingState
Enumeration of possible starting states.
Turn
Represents a turn in the game.
WelcomePage
Represents the welcome page of the application.
